Dialogue.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogue.Text: Later that night, when you're getting ready for bed, you're surprised to find Diana stopping by your nest to visit.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Hey, Phil. Homer gave me that Violet you made me, and I just... wanted to say thanks for spending so much time with me lately, and being so nice.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: I've been thinking a lot about the future, and I had a question.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: A lot of herds are heading out lately... What are your thoughts about leaving the valley?

Dialgoue.Speaker: Phil
Dialgoue.Text: 1) Well... it is pretty messed up around here. I don't blame them. 2) I think we could make it work here.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Yeah, you make a pretty good point... I'm sure all these other T-Rex around here have been bothering you as much as they've been bothering me. And with everything all burnt down... Maybe you're right.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: You... really think so? You know... I think I needed to hear that. Thanks, Phil. I don't mean to keep you up... I was just wondering what you thought about it. Thanks for listening, Phil.

Dialogue.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogue.Text: Later that night, when you're getting ready for bed, you're surprised to find Diana stopping by your nest to visit.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Hey Phil. I hope I'm not bothering you, I just thought I'd stop by.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: I actually had a question for you. I've been thinking a lot about the future lately.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: A lot of herds have been heading out of the valley lately... What are your thoughts on leaving?

Dialgoue.Speaker: Phil
Dialgoue.Text: 1) Well... it is pretty messed up around here. I don't blame them. 2) I think we could make it work here.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Yeah, you make a pretty good point... I'm sure all these other T-Rex around here have been bothering you as much as they've been bothering me. Maybe you're right.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Huh... You really think so? I'm not so sure... but I guess we'll have to see. Anyway, I just thought I'd stop by and hear your thoughts on it. Thanks for listening, Phil.
